title: Sue The 'Mingo
description: A children's book about a Flamingo named Sue and her colorful imagination! A rhyming story with illustrations on every page that are bright and fun! 32 pages, large 11" x 8 1/2" format, with heavy page stock and a colorful heavy card stock cover! A fun picture book / story book that kids (and parents) will want to read out loud.my link text
author: W.J. Smith Jr.
